arts.ttl: Mavididi rescues point for Leicester and denies Everton first win
arts.sum: After losing their opening four matches in the Premier League, Sean Dyche ’s side are off the mark for the season but will have to wait for their first three points. The torrential rain in Leicester nearly helped the hosts to a goal a minute later as Mavididi unintentionally tested Jordan Pickford with a wayward cross, but the goalkeeper kept it out.

arts.ttl: Sean Dyche believes Everton’s point at Leicester is ‘positive mini step’
arts.sum: Stephy Mavididi struck the equaliser as both sides wait for their first win.

arts.ttl: Leicester City 1-1 Everton live reaction as wait for first Premier League win goes on
arts.sum: Stephy was excellent in the second half, it was just that he’d run his race physically.” “Sometimes you make decisions and after you think you may have not got it right.

arts.ttl: Everton blow another lead in draw at Leicester amid thunderstorm
arts.sum: Everton sacrificed another first-half lead but earned their first point of the season at winless Leicester in a 1-1 draw which was delayed at half-time due to thunder and lightning.

arts.sum: Everton held on to register their first point of the season.

arts.ttl: Leicester 1-1 Everton: Highlights, man of the match, stats from league affair
arts.sum: Stephy Mavididi cancels out an opener from Iliman Ndiaye, as Leicester City draw 1-1 with Everton in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Ricardo Pereira mystery, disguised struggles, brawn preferred - 33 days of top-flight Leicester City - Jordan Blackwell - Leicestershire Live
arts.sum: Across the division, Premier League signings are getting younger, but City are taking a different approach. If told at the start of the season that City would use 20 players across their first four Premier League matches but that Ricardo wouldn't be one of them, it would be assumed that he’d picked up an injury.
